summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the U.S. Department of Justice, Domestic Preparedness Equipment Support - Group "C" Program; authorizing the execution of an agreement with the U.S. Department of Justice for financial assistance to purchase equipment for personal protection, detection, and communication; accepting the money when received; increasing the 1999 Budgets of the Police Department of Fire Department and, upon a three-fourths vote of the City Council, appropriating funds for such purpose.
